name: Battle Isle: Threshold Run (Canceled)
blurb: Threshold Run\u2122 is a turn-based tactics game set against a post-WWII alternate history.

rewards.reward: No Reward

ANDROID/DESKTOP DIGITAL PACKAGE ============================= Included is the full final release game in Android (Feb. 2014) or Desktop digital download (May 2014) and the PDF download Official Field Guide
DIGITAL MOBILE PACKAGE\r\n=============================\r\nIncluded is the full mobile final release game in Apple iOS download and the PDF download Official Field Guide

DIGITAL MOBILE DELUXE PACKAGE
=============================
100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book will showcase conceptual sketches of units and environments, behinds the scenes 3D modeling images, the full web comic series and extra goodies that were left on the cutting room floor.
============================
ALSO INCLUDES: Digital Mobile Package consisting of full mobile final release game in Apple iOS download through and the PDF download Official Field Guide

ANDROID/DESKTOP DIGITAL DELUXE PACK ============================= 100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book will showcase conceptual sketches of units and environments, behinds the scenes 3D modeling images, the full web comic series and extra goodies that were left on the cutting room floor. ============================ ALSO INCLUDES: Android/Desktop Digital Package consisting of full final release game in Android (Feb. 2014) or Desktop digital download (May 2014) and the PDF download Official Field Guide

CHRIS HUELSBECK DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK
=============================
Receive a high quality digital version of the complete music score and soundtrack for Threshold Run masterfully composed by Chris Huelsbeck, award winning musician and acclaimed gaming industry veteran.
=============================ALSO INCLUDES: Digital Mobile Deluxe Package consisting of the full mobile final release game in Apple iOS, 100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book & the PDF download Official Field Guide

CHRIS HUELSBECK DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK (Android/Desktop) ============================= Receive a high quality digital version of the complete music score and soundtrack for Threshold Run masterfully composed by Chris Huelsbeck, award winning musician and acclaimed gaming industry veteran. =============================ALSO INCLUDES: Android/Desktop Digital Deluxe Package consisting of the full final release game in Android (Feb. 2014) or Desktop digital download (May 2014), 100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book & the PDF download Official Field Guide

THRESHOLD RUN "PREMIUM DEPOT"
=============================
The Premium Depot unlocks all units within the game permanently without having to first earn them through the campaign or win them through the Challenge Missions. The Premium Depot consists of an exclusive depot background and contains all Human Infantry Weapons, Human Tanks, and Human Planes.
=============================
ALSO INCLUDES: Chris Huelsbeck Digital Soundtrack and Digital Mobile Deluxe Package consisting of the full mobile final release game in Apple iOS, 100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book & the PDF download Official Field Guide

THRESHOLD RUN "PREMIUM DEPOT" (Android/Desktop) ============================= The Premium Depot unlocks all units within the game permanently without having to first earn them through the campaign or win them through the Challenge Missions. The Premium Depot consists of an exclusive depot background and contains all Human Infantry Weapons, Human Tanks, and Human Planes. ============================= ALSO INCLUDES: Chris Huelsbeck Digital Soundtrack and Android/Desktop Digital Deluxe Package consisting of the full final release game in Android (Feb. 2014) or Desktop digital download (May 2014), 100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book & the PDF download Official Field Guide

BETA TEST UNLOCK & SPECIAL MENTION IN GAME CREDITS
=============================
Be one of the first in the world to play Battle Isle Threshold Run. Help us shape the game with your valuable feedback and be included in a special section of the credits of the product acknowledging your assistance & involvement.
=============================
ALSO INCLUDES: The Threshold Run "Premium Depot" as described above; Chris Huelsbeck Digital Soundtrack and Digital Mobile Deluxe Package consisting of the full mobile final release game in Apple iOS, 100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book & the PDF download Official Field Guide

KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE THRESHOLD RUN BACKER T-SHIRT\r\n============================= Proudly display your official status as a Threshold Run backer on Kickstarter with our exclusive T-Shirt only available through this offer.  T-Shirt is two-sided.  We will contact backers once the campaign is over with shirt size requests.\r\n============================= ALSO INCLUDES: Beta Test involvement & Special Credits as listed above; The Threshold Run "Premium Depot" as described above; Chris Huelsbeck Digital Soundtrack and Digital Mobile Deluxe Package consisting of the full mobile final release game in Apple iOS, 100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book & the PDF download Official Field Guide

LIMITED EDITION THRESHOLD RUN INFANTRY MINIATURES
============================= 
One (1) each of a Human & an EX Infantry 32mm model expertly sculpted by Tim Prow and cast in pewter, packaged and fulfilled by our friends at Mantic Games.  Be able to display the same models in the game on your desktop or anywhere you choose.  *Supplied unpainted*
============================= 
ALSO INCLUDES: Threshold Run Backer T-Shirt; Beta Test involvement & Special Credits as listed above; The Threshold Run "Premium Depot" as described above; Chris Huelsbeck Digital Soundtrack and Digital Mobile Deluxe Package consisting of the full mobile final release game in Apple iOS, 100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book & the PDF download Official Field Guide

Be able to display the same models in the game on your desktop or anywhere you choose. *Supplied unpainted* ============================= ALSO INCLUDES: Threshold Run Backer T-Shirt; Beta Test involvement & Special Credits as listed above; The Threshold Run "Premium Depot" as described above; Chris Huelsbeck Digital Soundtrack and Android/Desktop Digital Deluxe Package consisting of the full final release game in Android (Feb. 2014) or Desktop digital download (May 2014), 100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book & the PDF download Official Field Guide

LIMITED EDITION EX (ALIEN) MEDIUM RESIN TANK (Android/Desktop) ============================= This resin tank comes in at larger than 1/64 scale, modeled expertly by Tim Prow and cast in resin, packaged and fulfilled by our friends at Valiant Enterprises in the US. This exquisite model is the same as the Alien medium tank in the game. *Supplied unpainted* ============================= ALSO INCLUDES: BITR infantry miniatures; Threshold Run Backer T-Shirt; Beta Test involvement & Special Credits as listed above; The Threshold Run "Premium Depot" as described above; Chris Huelsbeck Digital Soundtrack and Android/Desktop Digital Deluxe Package consisting of the full final release game in Android (Feb. 2014) or Desktop digital download (May 2014), 100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book & the PDF download Official Field Guide

COMMANDER LIKENESS INCLUDED WITHIN THE GAME DIALOGUES & SPECIAL CREDITS\r\n============================= Five backers will be included in the game with their own likeness.  Our game director, Billy Garretsen, will personally illustrate each backers' likeness ensuring the utmost style and quality. Provide us a headshot of your choosing to be used as the basis of an original illustration that will be used during game dialogues. \r\n============================= ALSO INCLUDES: Resin EX heavy tank model; Resin EX medium tank model; BITR infantry miniatures; Threshold Run Backer T-Shirt; Beta Test involvement & Special Credits as listed above; The Threshold Run "Premium Depot" as described above; Chris Huelsbeck Digital Soundtrack and Digital Mobile Deluxe Package consisting of the full mobile final release game in Apple iOS, 100+ page PDF download Digital Art Book & the PDF download Official Field Guide
